website_summaries.verdict: Great as a base layer under makeup.
pros: Lightweight and quick drying formula makes this a great choice to wear underneath makeup and moisturizer
cons: Requires more product per application to work well, which makes the price much higher than they first thought

customer_reviews.title: 20 years later at 49 it still is a great product for me
customer_reviews.text: I used this serum MANY years ago as my go to eye de puffer when I barely had an ageing concerns (just anti-ageing). Now, 20 years later at 49 it still is a great product for me. My eyes aren't so puffy anymore (more water intake then back then, and no more alcohol). I still do get slightly puffy but my main concern now is moisture, anti-age and crepiness in my inner corners. I use all my facial serums and treatments around my eyes and top them off with this (with an occasional application of an oil or cream over top depending on conditions).
customer_reviews.author: Erin G.

customer_reviews.title: Bottle at least half empty when received.
customer_reviews.text: The product had to have been less than half full! I used exactly 3 small squirts per evening. Bought this in the middle of August and 5 weeks later it is empty. Will never buy this again from Amazon. I have purchased this product for years and this same amount always lasts at least 6 months if not longer! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Rae Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Love it! just one drop around every eye is ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! just one drop around every eye is enough. The little wrinkles fill up and your eye bags are not as sunken in. Of course, if someone has never done something for the wrinkles in years and you have already to many, you may not see a miracle result; but with daily use you may see some results. Try it...!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Figueroa A.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and won't go without it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and won't go without it. It takes about half of an hour or so to see lifting but it dose work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra Firming Eye lift
customer_reviews.text: Clarins Extra Firming Eye lift feels smooth and gentle enough to use every day. It helps lift the eye lids slightly for a more wide open look. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: blykin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It only okay in my opinion. I will not order again, only because there are other products that I like better
customer_reviews.author: Lessa

customer_reviews.title: Not full
customer_reviews.text: I opened when return from trip. And realized it was not full... . It was not filled to top . It has very little cream inside. Need to pump it 6 times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The description is not true.
customer_reviews.text: The quality does not match with the description. Extra firming? No, no firm at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, actually
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love. I'm in my 50's and have used this for decades.
customer_reviews.author: mom2er

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is great product, I am very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: Good, but seems used.
customer_reviews.text: It had about 6 pumps of product. I’m utterly Disappointed. Because I heard such great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Coggins

customer_reviews.title: Noticed difference between before and after
customer_reviews.text: I am still using it but in Love. I already noticed difference between before and after. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: karina isoton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Can feel and see the affects pretty quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a month and it doesn't seem to firm up much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you will not be disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: This serum has a slight cooling effect, does not "cake up". Great for allergy prone, sensitive skin,
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to open
customer_reviews.text: Funny story. I was traveling. When I unpacked I saw the nozzle of this bottle had flipped off. Not to be deterred, I thought I'd just unscrew the bottle and access the contents that way but the lid is fused shut. So I never got to find out if this expensive serum worked or not. It remains trapped inside the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Summers

customer_reviews.title: i would not buy it again
customer_reviews.text: first time use this products, very unsatisfied. it is very very hard to pump the cream out of the bottle. the bottle is opaque so have no idea if it is an empty bottle or the cream is too dry to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best eye lift product
customer_reviews.text: have been buying Clarins products for many years - it's the only product that I buy and love it and highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eye cream and I have tried alot of them. Alot cheaper than dept store and seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Product Won't Pump Out
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years and always bought from Macy's. I decided to give Amazon a try since it is a lower price than Macy's. I received this product at the end of April, 2019 and put it in my cupboard for use when my other one ran out. So went to use my new product this morning and it won't pump out!!!... and time expired on May 25 to return it. I'm not happy so I wasted $40.66 !!!
customer_reviews.author: georgie

customer_reviews.title: Toxic Ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I use clarins for years until I found out how many chemicals they actually put in a product I'm not going to be spending that kind of money when I can get the same type of toxic chemicals from a drugstore product!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: WRINKLES IN TIME...Yes, I still have them
customer_reviews.text: So far, I haven't seen the improvement I was expecting. I love Clarins products, but this one is a bit of a disappointment. I have been using it morning and night for more than a month...
customer_reviews.author: C. De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Fairy tales will come true - if only.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this serum did no more than a regular moisturizer. If the promises hadn't been so high-flying, my disappointment wouldn't have been so strong. A lot of money for little in the way of results.
customer_reviews.author: SusanMats

customer_reviews.title: Genuine products
customer_reviews.text: Was scared to buy this product on Amazon, but is genuine n is working well. The products r good and came in great condition. Price is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Koms

customer_reviews.title: Eyelids enflamed and flaking skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product since I purchased it but now my skin on my eyelids is so bad I need to get a prescription to heal it.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis J

customer_reviews.title: No surprise or bad feelings.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special about this eye cream. No surprise or bad feelings.
customer_reviews.author: Wenqi Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Mom's been using for years and tried everything else. It doesn't burn my eyes and does everything you'd ever want an eye cream to do.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Appeared to firm my upper eye lid within a few uses
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Definitely doing something!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells nice and seems to be working. My life hasn't changed, but who would expect a cream to change her life? At any rate, if I use it, my skin under my eyes looks more firm; if not, I see a difference. However, if you're tight on money, I'd go with a Neutrogena or something similar. For this price, I'd love it to be 5-stars and really take the dark circles away fully.
customer_reviews.author: Bevina del ReyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on my face.
customer_reviews.text: Product feels great on my face under and around my eyes. However, time will tell if it will help with lifting the eyes. A little pricey for the size you get.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy R.

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this product off and on for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product off and on for 20 plus years. always come back to this after use different brand of products. does what says it will. I have very sensitive skin but this one does not gives me any trouble at all. I use most clarins products and they work for me.
customer_reviews.author: worryneko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is just one of Clarins great products I have used for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: I've rarely been disappointed. This serum is no exception
customer_reviews.text: Clarins products have always worked well for me. I have tried other brands, but I always come back to Clarins. As my skin's needs have changed with age I have sampled almost every Clarins product line. I've rarely been disappointed. This serum is no exception. It won't replace a surgical eye lift, but it certainly does improve the overall look of the skin around the eye area. It is light and effective. A little goes a long way. Follow the recommended procedure for applying the product and you really can't go wrong. This isn't a moisturizing serum. I think it works best in combination with a Clarins eye balm/moisturizer that is appropriate for your age and skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Me

product_meta.title: Clarins Extra-Firming Eye Lift Perfecting Serum, 0.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: Clarins Extra-Firming Eye Lift Perfecting Serum is a targeted eye serum that visibly firms and reduces the appearance of wrinkles for youthful-looking eye contours. Albizia extract zeroes in on dark circles and puffiness and helps visibly reduce both along with green coffee; natural oat sugars visibly firm and lift; and Clarins' Extra-Firming Complex helps firm and tone the delicate eye contours.
feature_bullets: Expert anti-aging eye serum with a "lift" effect to fight puffiness and dark circles.
Albizia extract zeroes in on dark circles and puffiness.
Enhanced with Clarins patented Extra-Firming Complex of organic green banana and lemon thyme.
This powerful serum helps to revitalize skin for a firmer, younger looking eye contour area.
This is an authentic product backed by its original manfuacturer.
